attributes.action: Shorten the long school summer holidays
attributes.additional_details: School holidays seem to be growing year on year (in Wales our summer holidays have now leapt to 7 weeks long).  Include all the staff training days throughout the year and children are not getting the education they need.   Re-structure school holidays and shorten the summer ones in particular , not only to give the children a better, more thorough education but also to help working parents.
